item.title: 空客准备在报价遭拒后解雇 A220 工人
item.description: 据路透社看到的消息来源和调解员的建议，如果加拿大 A220 工人的最新合同报价在周三遭到拒绝，空中客车公司准备将他们解雇。【原文：Airbus is ready to lock out its Canadian A220 workers if a latest contract offer is rejected on Wednesday, according to sources and a conciliator's recommendations seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道接近历史最高水平的 LME 价格吸引中国铜出口
item.description: 三位行业消息人士称，中国铜生产商正计划出口多达 10 万吨金属，这是 12 年来出口量最大的一次，旨在为推动铜价创下历史新高并冲击其订单的涨势降温。【原文：China's copper producers are planning to export up to 100,000 metric tons of metal, the largest volume in 12 years, aiming to cool a rally that has propelled prices towards record highs and hit their order books, three industry sources said.】

item.title: 美国 4 月私营部门就业人数好于预期
item.description: 周三的一份报告显示，4月份美国私营企业薪资增幅超过预期，而前一个月的数据被上调。【原文：U.S. private payrolls increased more than expected in April while data for the prior month was revised higher, a report showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 健身和汽车产品需求强劲，Garmin 第一季度业绩超预期
item.description: 瑞士导航设备制造商 Garmin 周三公布的第一季度业绩超出华尔街预期，主要得益于新产品的推出以及健身和汽车领域对其产品的强劲需求。【原文：Swiss navigation device maker Garmin topped Wall Street expectations for first-quarter results on Wednesday, benefiting from new launches and strong demand for its products in fitness and auto segments.】

item.title: 美国消费者刷卡消费强劲，万事达卡利润上升
item.description: 尽管借贷成本上升，通胀持续，但美国消费者仍保持着挥霍的习惯，万事达卡第一季度利润因强劲的刷卡消费而大幅增长。【原文：Mastercard's first-quarter profit jumped on strong card spending as U.S. consumers kept up their splurging habits despite rising borrowing costs and persistent inflation.】

item.title: 中国和美国需求放缓，星巴克股价下跌，前景堪忧
item.description: 周三收盘前，星巴克股价下跌近 14%，此前该咖啡连锁店下调了年度预期，原因是通胀疲软的美国消费者需求持续疲软，而中国市场的复苏速度低于预期。【原文：Shares of Starbucks fell nearly 14% before the bell on Wednesday, after the coffee chain cut its annual forecasts on persistent weak demand in the United States from inflation-weary customers and a slower-than-expected recovery in China.】

item.title: 挪威海事上调年度利润目标，但第一季度收入不及预期拖累股价
item.description: 挪威邮轮公司（Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings）周三上调了全年盈利预期，此前该公司的第一季度盈利超出预期，原因是加勒比海等目的地的邮轮度假需求创下新高，而且船票价格上涨。【原文：Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings raised its full-year profit forecast after beating first-quarter earnings estimates on Wednesday, betting on record demand for cruise vacations to destinations like the Caribbean and higher ticket prices.】

item.title: AMD 和 Super Micro 盈利不及人工智能的高预期，业绩暴跌
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）和超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）的股价周三下挫，引发了芯片股的大跌，因为这两家公司的财报令投资者失望。【原文：Shares of Advanced Micro Devices and Super Micro Computer sank on Wednesday, sparking a selloff in chip stocks, after their earnings disappointed investors who have piled into the sector on hopes rising AI investments would boost demand.】

item.title: 洛布劳（Loblaw）公布第一季度业绩强劲，原因是需求复苏，食品价格下降
item.description: 加拿大食品和药房零售商 Loblaw Companies 周三公布的第一季度营收和利润超出预期，主要得益于消费者需求的持续增长以及日用品价格的回落。【原文：Canadian food and pharmacy retailer Loblaw Companies topped expectations for first-quarter revenue and profit on Wednesday, aided by sustained consumer demand well as easing prices of grocery items.】

item.title: 万豪因国际旅游需求提高盈利预期
item.description: 酒店运营商万豪国际集团（Marriott International）周三上调了年度调整后利润预期，寄希望于国际旅游需求抵消美国国内旅游的正常化。【原文：Hotel operator Marriott International raised its forecast for annual adjusted profit on Wednesday, banking on international travel demand to offset normalizing domestic travel in the U.S.】

item.title: 肯德基母公司百胜集团报告称，由于需求疲软，全球同店销售额意外下降
item.description: 百胜餐饮集团（Yum Brands）周三公布的季度全球同店销售额下降，原因是美国和海外市场通胀疲软的消费者对肯德基（KFC）和必胜客（Pizza Hut）品牌的需求下滑。【原文：Yum Brands reported a fall in quarterly global same-store sales on Wednesday, hurt by choppy demand for its KFC and Pizza Hut brands from inflation-weary consumers in the United States as well as in overseas markets.】

item.title: 管理费和年金业务强劲，KKR 盈利增长 20
item.description: 私募股权公司 KKR & Co Inc 周三表示，受强劲的管理和交易费用以及年金业务盈利的推动，其第一季度调整后净收入同比大增 20%。【原文：Private equity firm KKR & Co Inc said on Wednesday its first-quarter adjusted net income jumped 20% year-on-year, driven by strong management and transaction fees as well as earnings from its annuities business.】

item.title: 卡夫亨氏第一季度销售额低于预期
item.description: 卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）第一季度销售额周三未达华尔街预期，原因是通胀疲软的消费者对其品牌午餐套餐、肉类冷盘和通心粉及奶酪价格上涨产生了抵触情绪。【原文：Kraft Heinz missed Wall Street expectations for first-quarter sales on Wednesday, as inflation-weary consumers pushed back on higher prices of its branded lunch combos, meat cold cuts and mac & cheese.】

item.title: 由于拨备增加，纽约银行第一季度出现亏损
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）周三公布了第一季度的亏损报告，因为这家专注于商业房地产的贷款机构预留了更多资金以应对可能出现的违约情况。【原文：New York Community Bancorp reported a loss for the first quarter on Wednesday, as the commercial real estate-focused lender set aside more funds to cover possible defaults.】

item.title: 庞巴迪宣布 NetJets 成为 12 架挑战者公务机的买家
item.description: 加拿大庞巴迪公司（Bombardier）周三表示，NetJets 是该公司 12 月份宣布订购的 12 架挑战者 3500 公务喷气机的客户。【原文：Canada's Bombardier said on Wednesday NetJets was the customer for the order of 12 Challenger 3500 business jets announced in December.】

item.title: 安进公司投资者等待减肥药数据
item.description: 安进（Amgen）公司周四发布季度财报时，投资者将重点关注这家生物技术公司可能提供的有关其自身减肥药候选药物的最新信息。【原文：Amgen investors eyeing dramatic share price gains for rivals with successful obesity drugs will be focused on any updates the biotech company may provide on its own weight-loss drug candidates when it reports quarterly earnings on Thursday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，巴西航空工业公司正在考虑新型窄体喷气机的方案
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）正在探索一种新型窄体喷气机的方案，以挑战波音和空客的市场主导地位。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer is exploring options for a new narrowbody jet model to challenge the market dominance of Boeing and Airbus , the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 辉瑞因成本削减和 COVID 疫苗需求增加而上调 2024 年利润预期
item.description: 辉瑞公司周三上调了年度利润预期，原因是削减了成本，而且其 COVID 抗病毒治疗和疫苗的需求好于预期。【原文：Pfizer lifted its annual profit forecast on Wednesday, banking on cost cuts and better-than-expected demand for its COVID antiviral treatment and vaccine.】

item.title: 雅诗兰黛因美国和中国需求复苏而上调年度利润预期
item.description: 雅诗兰黛（Estee Lauder）周三上调了年度利润预期，第三季度销售额也超过了华尔街的目标，原因是美国和亚太地区市场对这家澳门金沙线上领彩金网口红生产商旗下价格较高的护肤品和香水的需求出现反弹。【原文：Estee Lauder raised its annual profit forecast and beat Wall Street targets for third-quarter sales on Wednesday, as demand for the MAC lipstick maker's higher-priced skincare and fragrances rebounded in the U.S. and Asia Pacific markets.】

item.title: CVS 下调 2024 年利润预期，原因是医疗成本飙升对保险部门造成冲击
item.description: 本周三，CVS Health Corp 下调了年度利润预期，第一季度盈利不及华尔街预期，原因是对非急诊手术的需求增加，导致其医疗保险业务的医疗成本上升。【原文：CVS Health Corp slashed its annual profit forecast and missed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter earnings on Wednesday, as elevated demand for non-urgent procedures increased medical costs at its health insurance business.】

item.title: 投资者期待 iPhone 中的人工智能，苹果销量将大幅下滑
item.description: 周四，苹果公司将公布一年多来最大的季度营收降幅报告，该公司计划在其 iPhone 手机中增加人工智能生成功能，并重振关键的中国市场下滑的销售业绩，这将成为市场关注的焦点。【原文：Apple's plan to add generative AI to its iPhones and revive sagging sales in the crucial Chinese market will be in focus on Thursday, when the tech giant is expected to report its biggest quarterly revenue decline in more than a year.】

item.title: 日本三井物产因能源业务疲软净利润下降 15
item.description: 日本三井物产（Mitsui）贸易公司周三表示，受能源业务表现疲软的影响，该公司预计截至 2025 年 3 月的财年净利润将下降 15.4%，至 9000 亿日元（约合 57 亿美元）。【原文：Japan's Mitsui expects net profit to fall 15.4% to 900 billion yen ($5.7 billion) for the fiscal year ending in March 2025, hit by weaker performance of its energy business, the trading house said on Wednesday.】

item.title: J&J公司推进64.75亿美元的滑石粉致癌诉讼和解方案
item.description: 强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）周三在一份声明中表示，该公司正在推进一项价值 64.75 亿美元的拟议和解方案，以解决数万起指控其婴儿爽身粉和其他滑石粉产品含有石棉并导致卵巢癌的诉讼。【原文：Johnson & Johnson is moving forward with a $6.475 billion proposed settlement of tens of thousands of lawsuits alleging that its baby powder and other talc products contain asbestos and cause ovarian cancer, the company said Wednesday in a statement.】

item.title: Flutter 股东支持在美国一级上市的举措
item.description: 本周三，Flutter 股东支持将其股票的主要上市地从伦敦迁至纽约的提议，而在此之前三个月，这家全球最大的在线博彩公司刚刚在美国增加了第二上市地。【原文：Flutter shareholders backed a proposal to move the primary listing of its shares from London to New York on Wednesday, just three months after the world's largest online betting company added a secondary listing in the United States.】

item.title: 加拿大 Cenovus 能源公司第一季度利润增长
item.description: 由于产量和吞吐量增加，加拿大石油天然气公司 Cenovus Energy 周三公布第一季度利润增长。【原文：Cenovus Energy posted a rise in first-quarter profit on Wednesday, as the Canadian oil and gas company benefited from higher production and throughput volumes.】

item.title: 杜邦利润超预期，上调全年预期
item.description: 工业材料生产商杜邦公司周三公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，并上调了全年业绩预期，原因是受益于电子和半导体部门销售额的增长。【原文：Industrial materials maker DuPont de Nemours beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit and raised its full-year forecasts on Wednesday, as it benefited from higher sales in its electronics and semiconductors segment.】

item.title: 凯雷集团第一季度盈利大增 59
item.description: 凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group）周三表示，受其私募股权投资组合资产销售强劲的推动，第一季度可分配利润同比增长近 59%。【原文：Carlyle Group said on Wednesday its first quarter distributable earnings jumped nearly 59% year-on-year driven by strong asset sales across its private equity portfolio.】

item.title: 芯片股拖累期指下跌，美联储利率决议拭目以待
item.description: 美国股指期货周三下跌，原因是低迷的业绩拖累了芯片类股票，而且市场在当天晚些时候更多经济数据和美联储利率决定公布前保持谨慎。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Wednesday as downbeat results dragged chip stocks and markets exercised caution ahead of more economic data and the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision later in the day.】

item.title: 早间竞价：2024 年美联储减息希望渺茫，债券五月天
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 更多美联储官员准备告别低利率世界
item.description: 越来越多的美联储官员认为，从不断膨胀的联邦赤字到对绿色能源、人工智能和国内制造业的投资需求等各种因素来看，COVID-19 大流行之前的超低利率不会重现。【原文：A growing number of Federal Reserve officials don't see a return to the ultra-low interest rates that prevailed before the COVID-19 pandemic due to everything from ballooning federal deficits to demand for investments in green energy, artificial intelligence and domestic manufacturing.】
